sys_remote_update_set.description: - expanded the Service tag field to 100 characters - change "Asset tag" label to "Verisk Asset tag" - added "Secondary asset tag" field - miscellaneous form updates - added "Hide record from lists" field on the User table - added "Hide records" Business Rule to filter out users with the "Hide record from lists" field checked for non-admin users
sys_remote_update_set.name: 2013-04-05 Changes before go-live
